name: Jumplats
description:
Jumplats is a 3D running platformer game, Jump through different levels in a game of "the floor is lava".

The game is still in very early development, I started the 24 July 2019. I try my best to upload update the more often.

If you find any bugs or have any suggestions for the game send it in here it would really help me making this game better : https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1rPRdq-JhW3TAhu8ZTiQD8jG2SArDNMKJW57GYOwDzbE/

You can follow me on twitter https://twitter.com/spyco01 I will send updates of the games
